groupbuilder.core.sys_utils

class groupbuilder.core.sys_utils.SysUtils[source]

Bases: object

Utility class for system information.

This class provides static methods to retrieve various system metrics such as CPU count and memory usage.

get_cpu_count()

Returns the number of physical CPU cores.

get_available_memory()

Returns the available memory in MB.

get_used_memory()

Returns the used memory in MB.

get_total_memory()

Returns the total memory in MB.
static get_available_memory()[source]

Returns the available memory in MB.

int
